panels.title: App Version
panels.description: app version with commit and branch links

targets.expr: 100 * (avg(avg_over_time(health{}[15m])) by (instance, service_id, version, service, cluster, env))
100 * avg(avg_over_time(health{}[15m])) by (instance, service_id, version, service, cluster, env) < 90

panels.title: Health Avg by Service over 15m with health < 90%
panels.description: Only displays services with health average < 90%

targets.expr: {env="${env}", cluster="${cluster}", product="${product}", network_type="${network_type}", namespace="${namespace}", pod="${pod}"} | json | level=~"(error|panic|fatal|crit)"

panels.title: TX Manager Gas Bump Exceeds Limit
TX Manager Time Until Broadcast
panels.description: The amount of time elapsed from when a transaction is enqueued to until it is broadcast

panels.title: TX Manager Time Until Confirmed
panels.description: The amount of time elapsed from a transaction being broadcast to being included in a block

targets.expr: sum(increase(evm_pool_rpc_node_calls_success{}[$__rate_interval])) by (instance, evmChainID, nodeName) / sum(increase(evm_pool_rpc_node_calls_total{}[$__rate_interval])) by (instance, evmChainID, nodeName)

panels.title: EVM Pool RPC Node Calls Success Rate

targets.expr: sum(increase(evm_pool_rpc_node_dials_failed{}[$__rate_interval])) by (instance, evmChainID, nodeName) / sum(increase(evm_pool_rpc_node_calls_total{}[$__rate_interval])) by (instance, evmChainID, nodeName)

panels.title: EVM Pool RPC Node Dials Failure Rate

targets.expr: sum(increase(evm_pool_rpc_node_verifies_success{}[$__rate_interval])) by (instance, evmChainID, nodeName) / sum(increase(evm_pool_rpc_node_verifies{}[$__rate_interval])) by (instance, evmChainID, nodeName) * 100

panels.title: EVM Pool RPC Node Verifies Success Rate

targets.expr: sum(increase(evm_pool_rpc_node_verifies_failed{}[$__rate_interval])) by (instance, evmChainID, nodeName) / sum(increase(evm_pool_rpc_node_verifies{}[$__rate_interval])) by (instance, evmChainID, nodeName) * 100

panels.title: EVM Pool RPC Node Verifies Failure Rate

EVM Pool RPC Node Calls Latency 0.95 quantile
EVM Pool RPC Node Calls Latency 0.99 quantile

Gas Updater All Tip Cap Percentiles

annotations.description: Component {{ index $labels "service_id" }} uptime in the last 15m is {{ index $values "C" }}%
annotations.summary: Uptime less than 90% over last 15 minutes on one component in a Node

annotations.description: ETH Balance critically low at {{ index $values "A" }} on {{ index $labels "instance" }}
annotations.summary: ETH Balance is lower than threshold

annotations.summary: Solana Balance is lower than threshold

annotations.description: {{ index $labels "instance" }} on ChainID {{ index $labels "ChainID" }} has received {{ index $values "A" }} heads over 10 minutes.
